alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Greer; Harmon; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:42AM CDT until July 06 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 542 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Butler to near Elk City to 5 miles south of Texola, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Sayre, Hobart, Mangum, Cordell, Granite, Burns Flat, Erick, Sentinel, Arapaho, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Corn, Lone Wolf, Custer City, Butler, Carter, and Bessie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Greer; Harmon; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita
